ingredients.ingredient: 2 portobello mushroom caps, cut into strips
salt and freshly ground black pepper
salt and freshly ground black pepper

cookingTips: Scoop out the dark gills from portobello caps to reduce moisture and prevent a soggy dish
Toss vegetables with oil just before baking to maintain their texture and prevent excess browning
Fresh thyme adds more subtle flavor than dried; add it just before baking for best results
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can you use earthy mushrooms and aromatic thyme to create a sophisticated vegetable side dish?
